RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: SELECT A.CONTRACT_REF_NO, B.USER_REF_NO, A.PRODUCT_CODE, A.COUNTERPARTY, B.FACILITY_NAME, A.CONTRACT_CCY, (SELECT CUSTOMER_NAME1 FROM OLTMS_CUSTOMER WHERE CUSTOMER_NO = A.COUNTERPARTY) CUST_NAME, (SELECT PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION FROM OLTMS_PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_CODE = A.PRODUCT_CODE) PROD_DESC FROM OLTB_CONTRACT_MASTER B, OLTB_CONTRACT A WHERE A.CONTRACT_REF_NO = B.CONTRACT_REF_NO AND A.LATEST_VERSION_NO = B.VERSION_NO AND A.PRODUCT_TYPE = 'C' AND A.AUTH_STATUS = 'A' AND A.BRANCH = GLOBAL.CURRENT_BRANCH AND A.CONTRACT_STATUS NOT IN ('V','L') AND A.MODULE_CODE = 'LB' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM OLVW_AVL_PROD_BR_USR WHERE PRODUCT_CODE = A.PRODUCT_CODE AND BRANCH_CODE = GLOBAL.CURRENT_BRANCH AND USER_ID = GLOBAL.USER_ID)
SELECT A.COLLATERAL_CODE, A.COLLATERAL_DESC FROM LBTMS_COLLATERAL A WHERE A.RECORD_STAT ='O' AND A.AUTH_STAT = 'A'
